step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the position is good. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Returning to the start is good. Pay attention to keeping your wrists straighter as you bring your hands back down.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer as you move your hands up. Spreading your elbows wide behind your head is perfect!
